content: Duchess Rycheza and Duke Odon have a conversation where she inquires about his well-being and asks if he has any concerns or matters to discuss. She then brings up Prince Kazimierz, Odon's friend and ally, reminding him of their friendship since 1085. Rycheza is aware of the political importance of their relationship with Kazimierz and his influence in Poland. She asks Odon if he has received any news from him or if there are any tensions between them. Duke Odon inquires as to who Prince Kazimierz is, which Rycheza addresses by reminding him of their long-standing friendship.
